name: Epileptor2D

x1.expression: tt * (c - z + Iext + Kvf * C - f1)

h.expression: modification * (x0 + 3 / (1 + np.exp(- (x1 + 0.5) / 0.1))) + (1 - modification) * (4 * (x1 - x0) + z_mask * (-0.1 * z **7))

references: [Proixetal_2014] Proix, T.; Bartolomei, F; Chauvel, P; Bernard, C; Jirsa, V.K. *Permittivity coupling across brain regions determines seizure recruitment in partial epilepsy.* J Neurosci 2014, 34:15009-21.
[Proixetal_2017] Proix, T.; Bartolomei, F; Guye, M.; Jirsa, V.K. *Individual brain structure and modelling predict seizure propagation.* Brain 2017, 140; 641–654.
